author: stsp
msg: Add a --strip (short: -p) option for use by svn patch.
This option has the same short and long names in UNIX patch,
and that's why they were chosen. I'm glad they were still available.
(svn_client_patch): Add STRIP_COUNT parameter. Tweak doc string while here.
(patch_target_t): No code change, but note that WC_PATH can now assumed
(resolve_target_path): Accept strip_count paramter, and if specified
strip path components from TARGET->wc_path as needed.
svn_client_patch): Accept STRIP_COUNT parameter and pass it on.
(maybe_send_patch_target_notification): Don't print paths as taken from
the patch file anymore, use the potentially stripped versions instead.

author: rhuijben
msg: Deprecate svn_wc_remove_from_revision_control and introduce a new
variant that takes an absolute path and a working copy context.
Also cleanup the implementation to use db functions instead of
(svn_wc_delete4, revert_entry): Update callers. Remove specializing around
(svn_wc__remove_from_revision_control_internal): ... this and take a db and

author: hwright
msg: Push an access baton removal up in the API stack.
(init_patch_target): Fix parameter formatting, and take a base_dir instead
(apply_one_patch): Give init_patch_target() a base dir instead of the
